channel.title: Activities on Laurine Huber
channel.description: Recent content in Activities on Laurine Huber

item.title: MALOTEC Seminars
item.description: I was happy to present several works in the context of our regular team meetings. https://malotec.loria.fr/

item.title: I'm Co-Chair of RECITAL 2020 !
item.description: I’m happy to be part of the organizing comitee of RECITAL, co-located (virtually) with JEP and TALN 2020. The conference JEP-TALN-RECITAL 2020 will be held online from 8 to 19 June. https://jep-taln2020.loria.fr/

item.title: PhD student day of the NLPKD department
item.description: I’m happy to co-organize the PhD Student day of the Natural Language Processing and Knowledge Discovery Department of our laboratory. This day will be the opportunity for all students to present their work. https://www.loria.fr/en/research/departments/natural-language-processing-and-knowledge-discovery/
